fields.name: The Last Dragon
fields.description: You are looking for a mighty quest, when you find a dying elf who speaks of dragons and great treasure. Can you challenge the Last Dragon and survive?
fields.intro_text:
You are returning to the Main Hall after completing a relatively easy adventure. You have rescued a young nobleman from a band of evil warriors. (Actually they were a motley band of petty thieves and misfits.) You brood disgustedly over the fact that there are no longer any great adventures in which a young warrior may prove his mettle.

With a twinge of envy you recall some of the great adventures recounted by the old timers over a flagon of mead at the Main Hall bar. Those were the days! Dragons to slay! Mighty wizards and warriors to battle! Elves, trolls, dwarves, orcs, and fairies still roamed the land!

With a snarl you dig your spurs into the flanks of your charger. He gives a startled snort and breaks into a wild gallop. The wild ride soothes your anger and you slow to a walk to allow your stallion, his once shiny coat now streaked with lather, to cool down.

---

Later, as you stand at the edge of a small stream idly stroking your charger's neck while he drinks, you hear a noise coming from behind a large shrub.

Your weapon instantly springs into your hand and you stealthily circle the shrub. You find a body lying face down near the stream. Cautiously you turn him over and look at his face.

By the Sacred Spear of Wotan! It appears to be an elf! Impossible! The last elves left Eamon shortly after the War of the Rings.

This one is badly wounded and delirious. He is babbling in the ancient tongue of the Eldar. You learned a bit of that language from Hokas Tokas when he was treating you for a very serious wound. You wish now that you had paid more attention. At the time learning a dead language seemed like a good way to ease the boredom of being bed-ridden.

---

The elf keeps talking about dragons. No. A dragon. The... Ultimate Dragon? No. The last dragon! An irreplaceable treasure? A ship waiting in a hidden cove. He draws a crude map in the mud showing its location and dies.

You stare silently at his body and ponder his words. A treasure! A dragon! A mysterious voyage!

He repeatedly used a phrase that you could not translate. You must remember to ask Hokas what "Quaal Dracis" means.

You think to yourself, "Here is your great adventure. Why hesitate? Do you want to live forever?" You mount your horse and ride toward the cove.

fields.name: You are in a secluded cove.  (E/U)
fields.description: You are on the beach of a secluded cove.  Behind you are high bluffs with a trail leading up to the Main Hall.  To the east a graceful ship lies at anchor.  Its mast head is a carved dragon so lifelike that you expect it to belch flame.

fields.name: You are aboard the Sea Dragon.  (W)
fields.description: You are on board the Sea Dragon.  The teakwood deck rocks gently under your boots as the ship rises and falls with the swells.  To the west is the cove.

fields.name: You are aboard the Sea Dragon.  (D)
fields.description: The Sea Dragon rides at anchor in a bay.  The elf crew all say goodbye and wish you well in your adventure.  The Captain takes your hand and says, "May the Holy Dragon protect you."  A ramp leads down to the beach.

fields.name: You are on a narrow beach.  (U)
fields.description: You are on a narrow strip of beach composed of black sand.  Steep forbidding cliffs rise to the north.  A narrow path winds its way up the cliff face.  To the south you see the Sea Dragon sailing away.

fields.name: You are atop a steep cliff.  (N/D)
fields.description: You are at the top of a steep cliff.  The beach is below and a winding path to the north leads to a flat, dusty plain.

fields.name: You are on a dusty plain.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a flat, dusty plain.  To the south are cliffs.  Far to the east are low, rock-strewn foothills.  The plain extends westward.

fields.name: You are in the foothills.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in rugged, rocky foothills.  The area is strewn with boulders and unusual rock formations.  To the west is a plain.  Far to the east is a mountain range.

fields.name: You are in a burial crypt.  (S)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be an ancient burial crypt.  The walls and floor are wet and slippery from water seeping through crevices in the rock.  To the south is the crypt entrance.

fields.name: You are on a winding road.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on a winding road through the mountains.  High above you see a falcon circling lazily.  To the west are foothills.  To the east is a stone blockhouse which guards the entrance to a massive fortress.

fields.name: You are in the blockhouse.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in the blockhouse.  It is made of massive granite blocks.  It has narrow slit windows and is lighted by torches mounted on the wall.  To the west is a door, to the east a portcullis.

fields.name: You are in the entry hall.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in the entry hall of the fortress.  It is a large room with marble floors and has a tapestry hanging on one wall.  There are doors to the north, south, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in the armory.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in large room.  It seems to be an armory.  You see many weapons and armor; but all are locked away in cabinets.  There are doors to the north and east.

fields.name: You are in a store room.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with no windows.  It seems to be a store room.  There are many boxes and crates stacked in the corners.  You see a wooden box.  There are doors to the north, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in the library.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are in a small library.  Most of the material here seems to deal with ancient legends, witchcraft, and sorcery.  You see an ancient scroll.  The exits are north, south, and west.

fields.name: You are in the dining room.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are in the fortress dining room.  You see a long table with low benches on each side.  At the head of the table is a large carved chair.  At the other end of the table is a slightly smaller carved chair.  There are doors east and south.

fields.name: You are in the kitchen.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You see an open hearth in which a large pot is being heated and an oven for baking.  There are doors to the west, east, and south.

fields.name: You are in the barracks.  (W)
fields.description: You are in the fortress barracks.  You see a number of beds, a table, and some chairs.  There is a door to the west.

fields.name: You are in the master bedroom.  (W/D)
fields.description: You are in the master bedroom of the fortress.  You see a large bed covered with a bear skin robe.  There is a large stained glass window in one wall.  There is a door to the west and a trap door in the floor.

fields.name: You are in a secret room.  (S/U)
fields.description: You are in a room which is filled with apparatus used for alchemy.  Someone seems to have been distilling elixirs.  A stone stairway leads up.  To the south is a wrought iron door.

fields.name: You are in a vault.  (N)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be the treasure vault of the fortress.  It seems to have been carved out of a natural cavern lying below the surface.  There is a doorway to the north.

fields.name: You are on a grassy plain.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are on a broad, grassy plain.  You see a herd of horses grazing far to the southwest.  The trail leads east to a dry arid area and north toward a tall mountain chain.

fields.name: You are at the foot of a mountain.  (S/U)
fields.description: You are at the base of a huge mountain whose peak is lost in the clouds.  You're having second thoughts about this "great adventure"; but it's too late to turn back now.  A steep path leads almost straight up.  A grassy plain lies south.

fields.name: You are on a narrow ledge.  (W/U/D)
fields.description: As you cling to the side of the mountain with aching muscles, numb feet, and torn and bloody hands; you curse the day you found that damned elf. You are just below the cloud level. The trail goes up and down. There is a cave in the cliff face to the west. It looks dark in there.

fields.name: You are in a small cave.  (E)
fields.description: Far to the rear you see a gleam of white.  It is the remains of an earlier adventurer.  He seems to have suffered a broken leg.  You wonder whether the poor wretch starved or froze to death.  The exit is east.

fields.name: You are on the mountain.  (N/D)
fields.description: You are above the cloud cover, near the top of the mountain.  The sun is shining brightly; but it is cold and windy here.  The trail leads down.

fields.name: You are in a large cave.  (N)
fields.description: The entrance has been sealed by a rock slide.  The walls give off a eerie green glow.  The cave extends north.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel.  (N/S)
fields.description: It is narrow here and the floor is rocky and uneven.  It is cold and damp in here.  You may go north or south.

fields.name: You are in a long tunnel.  (N/S)
fields.description: The tunnel seems to angle down toward the bowels of the mountain.  The floor is smooth and the air a little warmer.  You may go north or south.

fields.name: You are in the crystal cavern.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern.  Huge green stalactites hang from the ceiling, their tips almost touching the tips of the stalagmites rising from the cavern floor.  There are exits south, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is an eerie luminescent orange.  The exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is a translucent white.  The exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a long tunnel.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a long narrow tunnel which extends north and south.  To the south is the hidden entrance back into the large crystal cavern.

fields.name: You are in a short tunnel.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are at the north end of a short north/south tunnel. The air has become very warm. You are deep inside the mountain. The tunnel leads to the south, and a narrow opening lies to the east.

fields.name: You are in a secret cavern.  (N/W)
fields.description: To the west is the secret entrance back into the main tunnel.  To the north is a square opening which seems to have been chiseled out of the rock.

fields.name: You are in a large chamber.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a large well lit chamber.  It is a perfect cube and has been chiseled out of living rock.  To the south is a square hole leading into darkness.

fields.name: You are in a large cave.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a large cave.  The entrance has been sealed by a rock slide.  The walls give off a eerie green glow.  The cave extends north.

fields.name: You are in the crystal cavern.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern. Huge green stalactites hang from the ceiling, their tips almost touching the tips of the stalagmites rising from the cavern floor. The cavern leads south, east, and west, and a narrow passage leads north.

fields.name: You are in a short tunnel.  (N/S)
fields.description: The walls seem to catch the light and sparkle slightly.  To the south is a sliding door.  To the north is an opening.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is a translucent white.  The exit is south.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (N/E)
fields.description: A thin beam of sunlight comes in from a hole in the ceiling and forms a strange pattern on the dusty floor. A wide tunnel leads east and a smaller passage leads north into the darkness.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is an eerie luminescent orange.  The exit is south.

fields.name: You are in a small cave.  (N/W)
fields.description: Part of the ceiling has collapsed and the floor is strewn with rocks. The main cavern opens up to the west, and there is a narrow passage leading north.

fields.name: You are in a cavern. (N/S)
fields.description: To the south is the narrow passage back to the main tunnel. To the north is a square opening which seems to have been chiseled out of the rock.

fields.name: You are in a large chamber.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a large well lit chamber.  It is a perfect cube and has been chiseled out of living rock.  To the south is a square hole.

fields.name: You are in the dragon's lair.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in a huge cave. Behind you is a shimmering red light. High in the ceiling is a huge hole, with the sky visible. A smaller chamber lies to the west. To the north is a small hole which leads to the Main Hall.

fields.name: You are in the dragon's nest.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a medium sized cavern.  In the center of the floor is what appears to be a large nest.  There is an opening to the east.

fields.name: You are at the forest edge.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the edge of a gloomy, dark forest. It looks sinister and forbidding. A well defined trail leads north into its depths. You could try going off-trail in other directions, but it might be easy to get lost.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The vegetation is thin and the trees far apart. High in a tree, a raven stares silently at you. The trail goes north and south.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The vegetation is denser in this part of the forest and the trees are taller.  The sun is high in a pale, blue sky.  The trail branches north, south, and east.

fields.name: You are in an elm grove.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a grove of tall elm trees.  You hear a twig snap and glimpse a stag as he disappears into the underbrush.  The trail goes east and west.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dense forest.  You see no animals and hear no birds.  Far to the east you see high mountains.  The trail turns sharply to the south and west.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an extremely dense forest.  Shrubs and tree branches impede your progress.  There is a trail north and a twisting, ill-defined trail running to the south.

fields.name: You are in a clearing.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the east is a mountain chain.  To the north is a faint trail.  To the west is a circle of stone monoliths.

fields.name: You are at Myddrin Caer.  (E)
fields.description: You are inside the circle of thirteen monoliths.  On the surface of each is a bas relief carving depicting bizarre and perverted acts.  In the center of the circle is a granite altar.  The exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a pine forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The forest here is mostly pine trees which are about fifty feet tall.  The forest floor is carpeted with pine cones and needles.  The trail goes north and south.  A narrow path goes west.

fields.name: You are in a pine forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a forest of giant pine trees.  It is very quiet here except for the hooting of a solitary owl.  The trail goes north and south.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a dense, dark forest.  There is no sign of animal life.  The trees are twisted and gnarled.  The trail branches east and south.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dark, dank forest.  There is a feeling of great evil and malevolence here.  To the west is the trail.  To the north a single black tower rises majestically.

fields.name: You are in a huge cave.  (S)
fields.description: The cave is brightly lit by the wall of fire to the south.  It seems to give off light but not heat.  The walls and floor are smooth and even; this cave has been fashioned by man.

fields.name: You are in a pine forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: Here and there you see a giant redwood which makes the pine trees seem small by comparison.  The path runs south.  To the north is a solid wall of flame.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a forest of tall pine trees.  You catch a glimpse of a squirrel scampering across the forest floor.  To the west is a giant redwood tree about thirty feet in diameter.  The path branches north, south, and east.

fields.name: You are inside a giant redwood.  (E)
fields.description: You are inside a giant redwood tree which has been hollowed out to build a secret room.  Except for the lack of windows it looks like the inside of a hut.  There is a door to the east.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a forest of giant sequoia trees.  The tallest of them tower two hundred feet and are fifty feet in diameter.  The path goes north and there is a clearing to the west.

fields.name: You are in a clearing.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a clearing in a giant sequoia grove.  To the east is a path.  To the south is a temple constructed of large redwood blocks.  The place reeks of evil.

fields.name: You are in the temple of Sauron.  (N)
fields.description: You are inside a temple.  The floor is polished redwood.  Carved into the walls, also redwood, are pictures too vile and disgusting to be described.  An altar of black marble is in the center of the temple.  The door is to the north.

fields.name: You are in a courtyard.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in the courtyard of the black tower.  It is overgrown with weeds and grass.  You feel a tingling sensation all over your body.  To the south is a trail.  To the north is a door.

fields.name: You are in the black tower.  (S/U/D)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  The walls and floor are made of black stone.  A spiral staircase goes up and down.  To the south is a door.

fields.name: You are in the guard room.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a guard room.  You see a table and some chairs.  In one corner is a weapons rack.  A stairway leads up and down.  You feel very uneasy; but cannot understand why you feel that way.

fields.name: You are in the barracks.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in the soldier's quarters.  You see straw mats on the floor and various personal items stacked neatly next to them.  There are slit windows set into the walls.  A circular stairway leads up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof.  (D)
fields.description: You are on the roof of the black tower.  You look out over the countryside.  A fat yellow moon hangs low on the horizon.  Stairs lead down.

fields.name: You are in the dungeon. (N/W/U)
fields.description: You are in the dungeon of the black tower. A torch on the wall gives off a sickly, yellow light. Stairs lead up. To the north is a cell and to the west is a heavy wooden door.

fields.name: You are in a small cell. (S)
fields.description: It is damp and stinks terribly. A rat glares at you from one corner with baleful, yellow eyes. There is a door to the south.

fields.name: You are in a large room. (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a large room which is brightly lit by a chandelier hanging from the ceiling. The room contains no furniture and is totally bare. There are doors to the north and east.

fields.name: You are in the alchemy laboratory.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are in some kind of laboratory that contains a great deal of strange and unusual equipment.  There are doors to the south and west.

fields.name: You are in Sauron's lair.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in Sauron's lair.  The feeling of evil and depravity is overwhelming.  It is difficult to breathe.  The very air seems heavy and oppressive.  There are doors to the east and west.

fields.name: You are lost in the forest.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are hopelessly lost in a dense, dark forest.  The tree branches and underbrush impede your progress as if by diabolical design.  You have no idea which direction the trail lies.

fields.name: You are lost in the forest.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are hopelessly lost in a dense, dark forest.  The tree branches and underbrush impede your progress as if by diabolical design.  You have no idea which direction the trail lies.

fields.name: You are lost in the forest.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are hopelessly lost in a dense, dark forest.  The tree branches and underbrush impede your progress as if by diabolical design.  You have no idea which direction the trail lies.

fields.name: You are in the treasure chamber.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in Sauron's treasure room.  It is large and well lit.  To the east is a door.  To the north is the way back to the Main Hall.

fields.name: You are in a large cave.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a large cave.  The entrance has been sealed by a rock slide.  The walls give off a eerie green glow.  The cave extends north.

fields.name: You are in a small cave.  (N/S)
fields.description: Part of the ceiling has collapsed and the floor is strewn with rocks.  There are exits to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is an eerie luminescent orange.  The exits are north, south, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (W)
fields.description: A thin beam of sunlight comes in from a hole in the ceiling and forms a strange pattern on the dusty floor.  The exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is a translucent white.  The exit is east.

fields.name: You are in the crystal cavern.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern.  Huge green stalactites hang from the ceiling, their tips almost touching the tips of the stalagmites rising from the cavern floor.  There is an exit to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern.  The walls seem to catch the light and sparkle slightly.  To the east is a sliding door.

fields.name: You are in a secret cavern.  (S/W)
fields.description: To the south is the secret entrance back into the main tunnel.  To the west is a square opening which seems to have been chiseled out of the rock.

fields.name: You are in a large chamber.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a large well lit chamber.  It is a perfect cube and has been chiseled out of living rock.  To the east is a square hole.

fields.name: You are in a large cave.  (W)
fields.description: The entrance has been sealed by a rock slide.  The walls give off an eerie green glow.  The cave extends west.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is an eerie luminescent orange.  The exits are east and north.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel.  (S/E)
fields.description: The tunnel is narrow here and the floor is rocky and uneven.  It is cold and damp in here.  You may go east or south.

fields.name: You are in the crystal cavern.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern.  Huge green stalactites hang from the ceiling, their tips almost touching the tips of the stalagmites rising from the cavern floor.  The exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a small cavern.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern which contains a shallow pool.  The water in the pool is a translucent white.  The exits are west and south.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a long tunnel.  It seems to angle down toward the bowels of the mountain.  The floor is smooth and the air a little warmer.  You may go north or east.

fields.name: You are in a long tunnel.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are at the north end of a long narrow north/south tunnel. The walls and floor are slippery with slime. Here and there lie small pools of water. The tunnel leads south and a small opening leads east.

fields.name: You are in a long tunnel.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in a long narrow tunnel which extends north.  To the west is the hidden entrance back to the other long tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a short tunnel.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a small cavern. There are a few bats hanging upside down from the ceiling. You are deep inside the mountain and the air has become very warm. A tunnel leads south and there is a small square hole in the east wall.

fields.name: You are in a large chamber.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in a large well lit chamber.  It is a perfect cube and has been chiseled out of living rock.  To the west is a hole.

fields.name: wooden door
fields.description: You see a large wooden door with a peephole at the entrance of the blockhouse.

fields.name: portcullis
fields.description: You see a massive steel portcullis which guards the entrance to the fortress.

fields.name: large iron key
fields.description: You see a very large iron key.

fields.name: wrought iron door
fields.description: You see a wrought iron door with a crest depicting a swooping eagle with a snake in its talons.

fields.name: bronze key
fields.description: You see an unremarkable bronze key.

fields.name: iron door
fields.description: The door to the cell is very rusty.  It does not appear to have been used for some time.

fields.name: copper key
fields.description: You see a large copper key.  It is green and very tarnished.

fields.name: bronze door
fields.description: At the west end of the room is a huge bronze door.  Emblazoned on the door are two coiled serpents facing each other.

fields.name: silver key
fields.description: You see a small silver key.

fields.name: brass door
fields.description: At the north end of the room is a great brass door.

fields.name: oak door
fields.description: At the west end of the room is an oak door.  It is thick and sturdy and has carved gargoyles on its surface.

fields.name: gold key
fields.description: You see a large gold key.  It bears the twin coiled serpents-- The insignia of Sauron.

fields.name: torch
fields.description: You see a small torch lying in the sand.  You hope it is not too wet to burn.

fields.name: tablet
fields.description: You see a clay tablet.  It appears to be very old and is cracked and brittle.

fields.name: tapestry
fields.description: You see a large tapestry depicting a warrior locked in mortal combat with a very ferocious dragon.  It is difficult to tell who the victor will be.

fields.name: bronze lamp
fields.description: You see a small bronze lamp.  It is well made and of excellent workmanship.

fields.name: wooden box
fields.description: You see a wooden box.  It seems to be made of oak and has rope handles for carrying.  The crest on the lid depicts an eagle.

fields.name: silver goblet
fields.description: You see a silver goblet which has flying dragons engraved upon it and precious jewels embedded in it.  The jewels are rubies and sapphires.

fields.name: scroll
fields.description: You see an ancient parchment scroll.  It is yellowed and fragile.

fields.name: brown book
fields.description: You see the book of Al'Kazin.  It has a brown leather cover and gilded pages.

fields.name: small iron key
fields.description: You see an unremarkable small iron key.

fields.name: silver box
fields.description: You see a small silver box with ivory inlay.  An engraving on its lid depicts the death of Icarus.

fields.name: clear bottle
fields.description: You see a bottle containing a colorless liquid.  There are no markings of any kind on the bottle.

fields.name: large chest
fields.description: You see a large wooden chest.  It is reinforced with iron bands.  An eagle crest is emblazoned on the lid.

fields.name: red key
fields.description: You see an unremarkable small red key.

fields.name: emeralds
fields.description: You see a large leather sack containing red, green, and yellow emeralds.  They are very numerous and some are very large.

fields.name: gold ingots
fields.description: You see twelve golden ingots.  Each one is stamped with the eagle crest.  They are lustrous and heavy.

fields.name: black box
fields.description: You see a small box made of black ivory.  It is plain and contains no writing or markings of any kind.

fields.name: green key
fields.description: You see a green key.  It is tiny and insignificant.  You wonder what it will unlock.

fields.name: copper ring
fields.description: You see a beat-up, old copper ring.  It is made in the shape of a dragon devouring its own tail.  It is bent and tarnished.  On the inside of the band are engraved the words "Quaal Dracis".

fields.name: Invictus
fields.description: You see a beautiful sword sticking (it almost seems to be growing) out of the cave wall.  You see no seam or crack where the blade enters.  You wonder how it was put there.  Was it by wizardry or divine power?

fields.name: Invictus
fields.description: You see a beautiful two handed long sword.  The blade is fine blue steel, it is flexible but strong, and as sharp as a razor.  The hilt is simple and unspoiled by either jewels or precious metal.

fields.name: dragon eggs
fields.description: You see two large dragon eggs.  They are both about to hatch.  One is gold and has a crack running down its entire length.  The other is green and rocking back and forth furiously.  You watch in awe as it too begins to crack.

fields.name: silver coins
fields.description: You see a large leather sack containing a number of silver coins.

fields.name: snake statue
fields.description: You see a solid gold statue.  It is made in the shape of a coiled cobra with its hood puffed out and about to strike.  It is so lifelike that you can almost hear it hissing.

fields.name: large silver box
fields.description: You see a large silver box with writing in a script that is totally unfamiliar to you in a language that you cannot read.

fields.name: red bottle
fields.description: You see a bottle which contains a red liquid that is bubbling and warm to the touch.

fields.name: blue bottle
fields.description: You see a bottle containing a pale, blue liquid which is cool to the touch and smells slightly minty.

fields.name: bound Tancred
fields.description: Shackled to the cell wall is a Free Adventurer.  His hair and beard are filthy and matted and he has been badly tortured.  His eyes are wild and desperate.

fields.name: bound Lisolet
fields.description: You see a pretty woman.  She is nude and bound spread eagle on the altar.  Her armor and weapon have been piled in a heap near the altar.

fields.name: bound Igraine
fields.description: Bound to the altar is a nude, red-haired woman.  She frantically struggles with her bonds.  Her weapons and armor are stacked at the foot of the altar.

fields.name: ice slab
fields.description: In the center of the cave is a huge slab of ice.  It is completely opaque and you cannot see into it.

fields.name: Lebenstod
fields.description: You see a finely crafted sword with a gold hilt.  A large black stone is set into the pommel.  On the blade, in flowing script is engraved the word, "Lebenstod".

fields.name: battle axe
fields.description: You see a very sharp battle axe.  It is well made with a double headed blade and honed to razor sharpness.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You see a large leather bag which contains gold and silver coins.

fields.name: Nothung
fields.description: You see a long, double edged sword.  The hilt is plain and unadorned.  The blade is fine tempered steel.  Engraved on the blade is the word "Nothung".

fields.name: Angst
fields.description: You see a beautiful sword with a jeweled hilt.  The pommel is a silver skull with two small rubies in the eye sockets.  The name inscribed on the blade is "Angst".

fields.name: spear
fields.description: You see a long spear.  The shaft is made of sturdy oak and the point is fine, tempered steel.

fields.name: Blood Drinker
fields.description: You see a magnificent two-handed great sword.  The hilt is set with precious gems.  The gleaming blade is inscribed with the name, "Blood Drinker".

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see a mace with a spiked iron head and a wooden handle.  A leather thong is attached to the handle so that the mace can be hung from the wrist.

fields.name: dagger
fields.description: You see a sharp dagger.  The handle has an ivory inlay on which is carved a scene depicting the sack of Troy.

fields.name: lance
fields.description: You see a long, strong lance with a steel tip.  A pennant on the lance depicts two coiled serpents facing each other.

fields.name: broad sword
fields.description: You see German broadsword with a broad, double-edged blade, bearing on each side three blood gutters.  It has a globular steel pommel and wood grips.

fields.name: dueling dagger
fields.description: You see a dueling dagger.  The hilt has inlaid ivory and the blade is double-edged with two blood gutters.

fields.name: Bite
fields.description: You see a two-handed great sword.  The pommel stone is a green emerald and the hilt has three embedded jewels.  The blade gleams like the sun and has the name, "Bite", engraved upon it.

fields.name: dirk
fields.description: You see a sharp dirk.  The blade is blue steel and double-edged with one side having a saw-tooth edge.  The hilt is jeweled with gold inlay.

fields.name: red book
fields.description: You see a book with a red leather cover.  A circular gold seal showing a dragon is embossed on the cover.  The pages are yellow and water stained.

fields.name: Sauron's treasure
fields.description: You see a treasure so vast it is almost incomprehensible.  There are diamonds, emeralds, rubies, sapphires, and gold and silver coins.  There are jewel-encrusted, gold and silver goblets, plates, crowns, rings, bracelets,

fields.name: dead wolf
fields.description: You see the dead body of the wolf.  His gray pelt is now streaked with blood.  His mouth is open showing long, white fangs.

fields.name: Einar's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Einar.  In death he looks much smaller.  You look around for more foes.

fields.name: dead cave bear
fields.description: You see the dead body of the cave bear.  Even in death he looks enormous and very ferocious.  You mutter a prayer of thanks to Ilvutar.

fields.name: Kirstin's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Kirstin.  Her chain mail is hacked and bloody.  She lies on her side in a curled position.

fields.name: Hagen's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Hagen.  He looks peaceful as if he were only sleeping.

fields.name: Kinth's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Kinth.  You feel a deep sense of regret at having to slay the elf.

fields.name: Zyle's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Zyle.  He seems quite peaceful now.  There even seems to be a slight smile on his face.

fields.name: Ishi's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ishi.  You stare down at him and wonder what he was trying to warn you about.

fields.name: Ragnar's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ragnar.  The pain and rage in your heart are beyond description.  You vow to avenge him even if you must come back from the gates of Hell to do it.

fields.name: Woglinde's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Woglinde.  You hear an inhuman howl of pain and rage and are surprised to discover that the sound was made by you.  The world dissolves into a red haze as you advance toward your foe.

fields.name: Tancred's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Tancred.  You vow that his memory will be honored at the Main Hall with feasting and drinking and you curse Sauron.  Even in defeat and death he has wrought evil.

fields.name: Sauron's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Sauron. You prod his body with your weapon for signs of life. Then you hack off his head, hold it aloft in triumph, and chant your battle cry.

fields.name: Gwynnith's body
fields.description: You stare at the dead body of Gwynnith with tears of pity in your eyes.  The fairy is beautiful even in death.  You swear by Thor's hammer that Sauron will pay dearly for this innocent's death.

fields.name: Hundig's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Hundig.  You nudge him with your foot to make certain that he is dead and move on.

fields.name: Gudrun's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Gudrun.  She has fallen to her knees and wrapped her arms around her abdomen with her face touching the floor in the manner of a Samurai who has committed Hara Kiri.

fields.name: Siegmund's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Siegmund.  He was a great warrior and a worthy opponent; you salute him with your weapon and wish that you could have been comrades.

fields.name: Sieglinde's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Sieglinde.  She is lying on her back and her gray eyes now stare sightlessly at the ceiling.  You idly wonder about her relationship to the giant warrior.

fields.name: Erik's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Erik.  You stare down at the cowardly wizard with utter contempt.  In a fit of uncontrolled rage you methodically hack his dead body to pieces.  You will remember this act with shame to the end of your days.

fields.name: Yetu's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Yetu.  He is lying face down in the dirt.  You adjust some of the straps on your battered, dented armor and move on.

fields.name: Gunnar's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Gunnar.  You smile and think to yourself that the gods are still with you and have given you a great victory.

fields.name: Ilg's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ilg.  You smile down at him and say, "That was a foolish boast, Ilg, my friend!"

fields.name: Mylinth's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Mylinth.  She is lying on her back with one arm flung across her face.  Her mouth is twisted down in a grimace of pain.

fields.name: dead tiger
fields.description: You see the dead body of the tiger.  You wonder why it did not revert to being a mouse in death.  You tell yourself that this is no time for idle speculation and continue with your quest.

fields.name: dead unicorn
fields.description: You see the dead body of the unicorn.  Its white body is hacked and slashed and bloody.  The horn has been smashed and only the stump remains.

fields.name: Ogli's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ogli.  You check your armor and discover that there is a large dent in your helmet and that your shield has a large section missing.

fields.name: Vincingotrix's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Vincingotrix.  You wonder how old she was... 1000, 2000 years?  How many heroes have met her and perished?  Your wish has been granted.  You have met and conquered a great foe!

fields.name: Ossoric's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ossoric.  You wonder how formidable he would have been as a fully developed and mature male dragon.

fields.name: Ossogotrix's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ossogotrix.  She was the last female of her race.  Now there will be no eggs and no more dragons.

fields.name: Lisolet's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Lisolet.  She was not a real woman; but a creature from Hell, created by Sauron to lure adventurers to their deaths.

fields.name: Ortu's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ortu.  You raise your weapon to the heavens and give thanks to Odin for your victory.

fields.name: Omyi's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Omyi.  His head has nearly been severed from his body.  He is not a very pretty sight.

fields.name: Igraine's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Igraine.  Her red hair has fallen across her face.  You smooth it in place and caress her cheek.  You look into dead eyes and say, "You will be avenged!"

fields.name: Sumi's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Sumi.  You smile and say, "Thank you for the warm welcome, dwarf."

fields.name: Gollem's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Gollem.  He has slid down a wall and now sits propped up with his legs out in front of him like a giant doll.

fields.name: Zog's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Zog.  He lies on his side with blood streaming from his wounds.

fields.name: Kree's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Kree.  You hope the ale he drank was good, since it will be the last drink he ever gets.

fields.name: Xuti's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Xuti.  He will never gamble again.

fields.name: Minlak's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Minlak.  You wonder how much gold he won from poor Xuti.

fields.name: dead harpy
fields.description: You see the dead body of the harpy.  You think that this Sauron must have been overrated.  Killing him was not too very difficult.  Then something strange begins to happen.

fields.name: dead griffin
fields.description: You see the dead body of the griffin.  You kick it with your boot and wonder if there are any more surprises in store for you.

fields.name: dead centaur
fields.description: You see the dead body of the centaur.  You nudge the body with your weapon and hope that this is the last transformation.  You are becoming just a little apprehensive.

fields.name: cave entrance
fields.description: To the north is a large cave entrance; but some unseen force prevents you from entering.

fields.name: shimmering golden light
fields.description: A shimmering golden light blocks the exit to the north.

fields.name: shimmering golden light
fields.description: A shimmering golden light blocks the exit to the north.

fields.name: shimmering golden light
fields.description: A shimmering golden light blocks the exit to the north.

fields.name: shimmering golden light
fields.description: A shimmering golden light blocks the exit to the north.

fields.text: In the beginning the sword, "Invictus", was forged by the god Melkior and was tempered with the blood of the centaur Chiron.  It was stolen by Anthor, the servant of the Evil One.  It was recovered by the Brotherhood from Ishvatur.

It is written in the book of Ormael that dragons live thousands of years.  But at the end of their life span they are in great pain.  Their scales become brittle and begin to fall out.  Their bones ache terribly with each step they take.

Throughout history there have been many magical swords forged.  There was Angst, Nothung, Anduril, Sting, TrollsFire, and many others.  However one of the greatest was Invictus which the gods created for a special purpose.

Leg broken in slide.  Others perished.  Quest failed.  Vincingotrix must be dealt with.  Invictus protected.  Very cold.  Hungry.  Something approaches cave.  Must hold out.  Long live the Brotherhood.  Hrothgar of Essen.
With his dying breath, Hagen shouts, "You will never enter the Volsung Fortress, Outlander!"  You see him try to swallow a key before he falls to the ground.
As he lies dying, Kinth smiles and says, "Many thanks for delivering me from the evil grip of Sauron.  Good luck, warrior."
As he lies dying Zyle becomes calm and composed.  He says, "Do not blame yourself for my death.  You have released me from a fate much worse."
As he lies on the ground, Ishi seems to emerge from his trance-like state.  He looks up at you and whispers, "Beware of the beautiful beast.  It looks...."  You cannot make out the rest.
Ragnar sinks to one knee and shouts to you, "I am dying, my love.  Swear to me by Wotan's spear, hewn from the tree of life that you will avenge me!"  Then he falls to the ground and is still.
Woglinde turns to you and says, "I am mortally wounded.  Remember me; but do not mourn.  I will love you forever.  I ask one last thing of you....  Butcher this dog!"

With his dying breath Tancred says, "My friend, you know that I did not betray you of my own free will.  I was under the spell of Sauron.  When you are again with friends in the Main Hall, think of me with kindness."
Sauron looks at you with eyes filled with pain and hatred.  With his dying breath he curses you.

Gwynnith looks down at her poor wounded body and smiles.  She blesses you for freeing her from the power of the Black Lord.  She says, "The hatchlings may be recalled when you enter Sauron's lair by SAYing OROWE; but there is a risk..."
Your body writhes in pain as it rearranges itself.  It is growing protuberances where there should be none and eliminating the normal ones.  Even your voice has changed.
You are once again assailed by intense pain as your body returns to its normal shape.

The wizard begins to laugh.  It starts as a chuckle and builds until the entire chamber reverberates with his mocking merriment.  His mockery saves you.  Your bewilderment and despair had pushed you to the brink of insanity.
The despair changed to fiery rage and finally to cold hatred.  You vow that the wizard will not live to see the light of day.
Mylinth mutters an incantation and flings a powder at your feet.  There is a puff of smoke and everything goes black.
Mylinth says, "Cyric rha n'mirth" and gestures toward a small mouse in the corner of the cave.
The words have scarcely left your lips when you hear a thunderous roar and the ice block shatters into a million shards. Lying on the ground, no longer encased in ice, is a human body.
Gwynnith points a wand in your direction and says, "Orowe n'minrith shweeta."  You don't know what that means, but it does not seem to be a friendly greeting.

"Welcome to Quaal Dracis, the fellowship of the dragon. It was foretold that you would come to release the old dragon from her suffering. By bending the young hatchlings to your will, you proved yourself a true dragon master.

"It may seem strange that warriors should dedicate themselves to saving the great dragons from extinction.  Consider this, to be a great hero one must do great deeds.  Great deeds require mighty opponents.

"Mark my words well!  When the last dragon perishes from the face of Eamon, the age of the great heroes will also come to an end.  However this is but a test.  Now comes the true quest and it is two-fold.

"First, the dragons are inexperienced and must be blooded.  Second, the evil wizard, Sauron, is planning to return with an army of trolls, orcs, and dwarves to wreak vengeance upon mankind.  He must be stopped.

If you would accept this quest and join the brotherhood simply SAY the sacred word, KJELTHOR, and you will be transported to Sauron's realm together with the hatchlings.  You may also decline the honor and return to the Main Hall.
Tancred becomes very agitated and begins to shiver.  His mouth twitches uncontrollably.  You stare into his eyes and see total madness.
The unseen barrier no longer impedes you and you enter the cave.  Suddenly the ground begins to shake and the cave entrance collapses.  There is no going back.  You must succeed or die.

You have destroyed Sauron; but allowed Ossoric to be killed.  There will be no mating.  When Ossogotrix dies the age of the great dragons will end.  You will be reviled and despised by the Brotherhood.
You have succeeded in your quest; but Ossogotrix is dead!  Now there will be no dragon eggs and Ossoric will be the last of his race.  You are not very popular with the Brothers of the Dragon.
You are a blundering fool!  You have allowed both dragons to be killed!  You are now the sworn enemy of the Brotherhood of the Dragon.  They have all sworn vengeance upon you.

You are ambushed by five large warriors from the Brotherhood.  They overpower you before you can defend yourself.  They strip you of your armor, possessions, and weapons.  They begin to beat you without mercy about the head
and shoulders with the flats of their swords.  You are driven bleeding and naked from the kingdom.
The shimmering golden light opens like an iris.  You step quickly through it and find yourself in the dragon's lair.  You mutter a quick prayer to Fricka and grip your weapon tightly.
You cannot win the hatchlings to your side while the mother lives.  As your allies they would be forced to help you kill her.  The gods will not permit matricide.
You have already slain one of the hatchlings.  The other is now your enemy to the death, it will never become your ally.  You must now fight or die.
There is a hush and you see a large, shimmering golden globe floating about three feet above the ground.  A soothing, kindly voice from within the sphere speaks your name.
The dragons calm down. Ossoric comes over and lies at your feet. Ossogotrix playfully nuzzles your leg like a large, overgrown puppy.

The Captain of the dragon ship, a large elf, walks over.  You tell him of the dead elf you found on the road.  He grimaces and says, "Very well, Outlander.  I sail with the tide.  If you wish to book passage there is a fee of 100 gold pieces."

The Captain stares at you with a look of awe and respect.  He says, "I did not know that you were one of the chosen.  Put away your gold.  There is no fee for your passage.  I am very honored to have you aboard."
The Captain shouts orders to the crew.  They weigh anchor and set sail.  The dragon ship leaves the cove and sails east for three days.  Finally you sail into a bay and drop anchor.
As you clean your weapon you cut yourself and the blood of the unicorn mingles with yours.  The blood in your veins turns to liquid fire, your head aches, and your vision grows fuzzy.

A beautiful elf appears.  She looks at you with sad eyes and says, "Poor wretch!  Did you not realize that the great sword, Invictus, may only be used to slay great dragons!"  Then both she and the sword disappear.
The beautiful elf reappears.  She smiles and says, "The gods, in their mercy, have given you another chance.  Do not repeat your foolish mistake.  May your quest be successful."  Then she disappears.

A beautiful elf suddenly appears.  She looks at the body of Vincingotrix and says, "The deed is done.  Now Invictus must be returned to the Halls of Ishvatur."  Both she and the sword disappear in a flash of green light.

You climb onto Ossoric's back.  He begins to flap his wings and flies up and out of the lair.  You experience exhilaration almost too intense to be endured.  It is as if you have become one with the great dragon. You throw back your head and shout your battle cry. Ossoric roars in unison with you and Ossogotrix, flying on his right, answers his roar. This is how a warrior was meant to go into battle!  Astride the back of a mighty dragon! You recall the ancient legends of the Dragon Riders and wonder...  You would almost give your soul to have this ride continue forever! All too soon it ends. Ossoric begins to circle and glides to earth in a clearing in a dense forest. Ossogotrix lands beside him.

Reluctantly you slide from his back and peer around.  Ossoric snorts, then belches a ten foot stream of flame.  Ossogotrix does the same.  You advance toward the forest with a fighting dragon on each flank!
The floor begins to shudder and shake.  There is a shrill sound like the shrieking of a banshee as Invictus slowly slides out of the cave wall and falls to the floor.
There is a flash of purple light and Ossoric appears!
Almost immediately, Ossogotrix appears!
The elf says, "Then try swimming, Outlander!"  All the elves disappear and you are alone on the ship.
"You don't have enough gold!", snarls the Captain.  The elves seize you and toss you overboard.
You hear a loud crack and some rocks fall from the ceiling of the tunnel! You begin to question the stability of these tunnels.
You feel a slight tingling sensation, but nothing else happens.
and weapons.  A magic force surrounds the whole pile, making it light as a feather!

fields.name: Wolf
fields.description: You see a very large wolf.  His pelt is gray and shaggy; his eyes, like twin red globes, follow your every move.

fields.name: Einar
fields.description: A tall, burly soldier sounds the alarm and moves swiftly toward you.  For a big man, he is exceptionally agile.

fields.name: Cave Bear
fields.description: A large cave bear ambles out of the darkness.  He sees you and stands on his hind legs, almost touching the cave roof with his head.

fields.name: Kirstin
fields.description: You see a raven-haired maiden sitting at the table eating a haunch of venison.  She looks up at you and her green eyes narrow to slits.  You notice she is wearing light chain mail.

fields.name: Hagen
fields.description: A tall, red-haired warrior in chain mail covered with a bear skin outer garment suddenly looms before you.  As he looks at you his eyes glaze and his expression becomes blank.  He is a berserker.

fields.name: Kinth
fields.description: An elf springs from behind a tree and blocks your path.  He must have been captured and enslaved by Sauron for the elves have always been allies in the war against the Dark Lord.

fields.name: Zyle
fields.description: An elf who has been lurking in the corner begins to shout at you.  His eyes are wild and deranged.  You cannot understand his words; but they do not sound very friendly.

fields.name: Ishi
fields.description: Standing near the altar is an elf in scarlet robes.  His face is blank and he walks like a sleepwalker.

fields.name: Ragnar
fields.description: Lying on the floor is a warrior.  He gazes at you with eyes as black as a wintery sky on a moonless night.  For a fleeting moment you are shaken by an emotion you cannot describe and do not understand.  He smiles and says hello.

fields.name: Woglinde
fields.description: Lying on the floor is a woman; a warrior of the ancient race.  She is the most exquisite creature you have ever seen.  She stirs and sits up.  Your eyes meet and there is no need for words.  She rises silently and moves to your side.

fields.name: Tancred
fields.description: Tancred thanks you for freeing him and begs you to give him a weapon; so that he may avenge his dishonor at the hands of Sauron.  His eyes burn with an intensity that borders on insanity.

fields.name: Sauron
fields.description: The body of the centaur disappears and you see Sauron in his true form once more.  He says, "You are a great warrior.  If you are not killed in this battle, I will make you my personal slave."

fields.name: Gwynnith
fields.description: Blocking your path is a beautiful, young fairy.  She has the face of an angel; but you can tell by looking at her eyes that Sauron has her in his thrall.

fields.name: Hundig
fields.description: You see a man sitting at a grinding wheel putting an edge on his weapon.  He is so preoccupied that he does not immediately notice you.

fields.name: Gudrun
fields.description: Lying on one bunk is a young blonde woman.  She has taken off her boots; but is otherwise fully clothed in chain mail.  She raises up on one elbow and tells you to get out.

fields.name: Siegmund
fields.description: A young giant of a man with red-gold hair and gray eyes is standing in the room.  He is embracing a slender youth of equal height.  Both wear chain mail armor.  He sees you and springs to one side.

fields.name: Sieglinde
fields.description: The "youth" spins around.  It is a girl!  Her red-blonde hair is cropped short; her gray eyes are as ferocious as those of the male.  You notice that their faces are like mirror images of each other.

fields.name: Erik
fields.description: You see a man clothed in a black hooded robe.  He carries a long staff.  He gestures in your direction and says words you cannot hear.  However you begin to experience a feeling of very intense physical discomfort.

fields.name: Yetu
fields.description: You see an ugly, filthy orc.  He glares at you with evil, bloodshot eyes.  He readies his weapon and advances toward you in a slow, shambling gait.

fields.name: Gunnar
fields.description: You see a giant.  He is about ten feet tall and looks very strong.  He picks up a club and lumbers toward you.

fields.name: Ilg
fields.description: A large troll looks you up and down and grins broadly.  "Come, dog, and meet your death!" he roars.

fields.name: Mylinth
fields.description: You see a tall, beautiful young woman.  Her long hair is the color of corn silk; but her eyes are most remarkable.  One is green, the other is blue.  She is a witch.

fields.name: Tiger
fields.description: The mouse begins to squeak in terror.  His body begins to grow and expand and his squeaks become growls.  The mouse has changed into a tiger.

fields.name: Unicorn
fields.description: You see a large, white unicorn.  He is rubbing his horn against one of the large stalagmites.  He sees you and begins to snort and paw the ground.

fields.name: Ogli
fields.description: Standing before the square opening is a dwarf.  He smiles, draws a short sword and says, "Greetings, Outlander!"

fields.name: Vincingotrix
fields.description: You see a very, very large dragon.  It has just flown through the large hole in the ceiling.  Now it sits there glowering at you and breathing fire.  It is a very old female and her golden scales are brittle and cracked.

fields.name: Ossoric
fields.description: One of the eggs breaks open and you see a small, male dragon.  His scales are a bronze color and he is moving rather awkwardly.

fields.name: Ossogotrix
fields.description: The other egg opens and a small female dragon emerges.  Her scales are green.  She tries to ignite her flame; but only manages to produce smoke, which makes her sneeze uncontrollably.

fields.name: Lisolet
fields.description: The woman springs from the altar and immediately dresses and arms herself.  She smiles... a cruel smile.  And motions for you to approach.

fields.name: Ortu
fields.description: Standing at the bend in the trail and leaning on a spear is an orc.  He spits at you and readies his weapon.

fields.name: Omyi
fields.description: Standing at the altar is a dwarf.  He is about to plunge a dagger into the heart of the woman who is bound to the altar.

fields.name: Igraine
fields.description: Igraine quickly dons her armor and picks up her weapon.  Her green eyes flash fire as she looks at you and salutes with her sword.

fields.name: Sumi
fields.description: Standing guard at the door of the cell is a dwarf.  As you descend the stairs he sneers and growls, "Welcome to Hell, Outlander!"

fields.name: Gollem
fields.description: Standing guard in front of the north door is a large orc.  He makes an obscene gesture at you and readies his spear.  He adjusts his shield and rushes toward you shouting his battle cry.

fields.name: Zog
fields.description: On the other side of the room a troll is busily adjusting a strange piece of laboratory equipment.  He hears you enter and whirls to face you.

fields.name: Kree
fields.description: Sitting at the table, drinking a cup of ale, is a troll.  He finishes his drink and wipes his mouth with the back of his hand.  Then he stands and draws a two-handed great sword.

fields.name: Xuti
fields.description: Kneeling on the floor is a dwarf.  He is about to roll dice and freezes in mid-motion.

fields.name: Minlak
fields.description: Squatting on the floor directly across from the dwarf is an orc with whom he was gambling.  He seems very unhappy about your intrusion.

fields.name: Harpy
fields.description: You see a tall man in a hooded, white robe.  His face is handsome; but there is an aura of evil about him.  He murmurs something and is transformed into a harpy with the head of a woman and the body, wings, and claws of a giant bird.

fields.name: Griffin
fields.description: The body of the harpy disappears and in its place you see a griffin, an awesome creature with the head and wings of an eagle and the body of a lion.

fields.name: Centaur
fields.description: The griffin's body disappears in a puff of smoke and is replaced by a centaur.  A formidable creature with the torso of a man and the body of a horse.

fields.question: The Last Dragon -- Can I avoid paying the boat fee?
The Last Dragon -- How do I enter the large cave?
The Last Dragon -- How do I get Invictus?
The Last Dragon -- How do I pass the golden light?
The Last Dragon -- How do I defeat Vincingotrix?
The Last Dragon -- How do I defeat the hatchlings?
The Last Dragon -- How do I get the hatchlings back?
The Last Dragon -- What do I do with the ice slab?
The Last Dragon -- Invictus was taken away!

fields.answer: Yes.  Select the option to say something, then say QUAAL DRACIS.
SAY QUAAL DRACIS while wearing the copper ring.
SAY QUAAL DRACIS while wearing the copper ring.
SAY QUAAL DRACIS while wearing the copper ring.
READY INVICTUS and ATTACK with it.
Don't!  Instead, win them to your side by SAYing QUAAL DRACIS.
SAY OROWE when you are in Sauron's lair.
SAY QUAAL DRACIS while wearing the copper ring.
You can't ATTACK anything except the old dragon with it.  Use your POWER spell to get it back.
